resources.string:
We don’t try to be anything but who we are. We are an avenue for you to tell your story whether you’re a trend setter, trend follower or an individual. We value your ability to create your own personal style.

Housing an extensive collection of iconic global brands, we pride ourselves on stocking the latest and greatest footwear and apparel.

Our ranges are carefully selected so you can find a treasured iconic style or a newly engineered silhouette.

The aim of the app is to create a list of shoes.

Each shoe item in the list has some basic details like shoe size, description etc.

Your job is to create new shoe items by entering the required details.
